column4: whenever i use apt-get via the command line it shows me a huge list of libs that it calls orphans and suggests i remove them, should i?
if you never installed any third-party programs in awkward (non-apt, non-repositories) way, then yes it should be safe to remove them
are you sure? nothing is going to break if i did that?
no, i'm not sure. yet, i do it daily.
